David Cameron I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government. `` During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism.
